column4: hi all - this must be easy but i've wasted an hour or two searching without result. i want to find files that contain some substring, but they are within .zip archives, so i can't use "find" or "sagasu" (it seems). a gui would be nice but i'd settle for anything that works right now. can anyone point me at something? thanks
did you try unzip -l somefile.zip | grep *pattern*
